name: City Commuter
description: A comfortable and practical urban commuter bike for daily city commutes.

name: City Explorer Pro
description: An advanced urban bike with enhanced features for exploring the city.

name: Urban Speedster
description: A sleek and fast urban bike designed for quick rides through the city streets.

name: All-Terrain Cruiser
description: A versatile cruiser bike built for both city streets and rugged mountain trails.

name: Mountain Explorer
description: An exploration-focused mountain bike designed for conquering challenging trails.

name: Trail Blaster
description: A powerful mountain bike built to blast through any trail obstacles.

name: Speed Demon
description: A high-speed road bike designed for competitive racing and long-distance rides.

name: Road Dominator
description: A dominant road bike engineered for ultimate performance and control.

name: Road Voyager
description: An adventurous road bike ready to take on any road journey with ease.

name: City Adventurer
description: An adventurous urban bike designed to explore the city's hidden gems.

name: City Sprinter
description: A speedy urban bike built for sprinting through city traffic with ease.

name: City Trekker
description: A versatile urban bike perfect for trekking through urban landscapes and beyond.

name: Electric Commuter
description: A commuter bike equipped with an electric motor for assisted pedaling.

name: Folding Commuter
description: A compact commuter bike that can be folded for easy storage and transport.

name: Urban Hybrid
description: A versatile hybrid bike suitable for both city streets and light off-road trails.

name: Beach Cruiser
description: A classic cruiser bike perfect for leisurely rides along the beach.

name: Gravel Explorer
description: A rugged bike optimized for riding on gravel roads and rough terrain.

name: Kids' Mountain Bike
description: A mountain bike specially designed for children's outdoor adventures.

name: Expedition Touring
description: A touring bike built for long-distance expeditions and adventures.

name: Freestyle BMX
description: A versatile BMX bike suitable for performing tricks and stunts.

name: Urban Tandem
description: A tandem bike designed for urban commuting and leisurely rides.

name: Urban Cargo
description: A cargo bike equipped with racks for transporting goods in urban environments.

name: Bike Lock
description: A durable bike lock to keep your bike secure when not in use.

name: Water Bottle Holder
description: A convenient holder to keep your water bottle within reach during rides.

name: Front Light
description: A powerful front light to illuminate your path during night rides.

name: Rear Light
description: A rear light to enhance visibility and safety while riding in low-light conditions.

name: Handlebar Bag
description: A convenient bag that attaches to your handlebars for storing essentials during rides.
